text:
We are experiencing tomcat appearing to shutdown at random times, although we 
cannot confirm this as nothing is reported in the jasper.log file. We have a 
standard installation, is there a way to turn on additional log options or 
another way to diagnose this problem. Shutting down and restarting Tomcat 
solves the problem.

Thanks,
creator: patrick.n.stutz@accenture.com
cmanolache@yahoo.com
text:
It may be user code, or JVM bug. Please provide more info. You can enable 
debug using server.xml - but for shutdown there is little you can do ( since it probably crashes ). You can try to disable ajp12 ( and the shutdown command).
